story: Loay El-Assal shared Global Vision Egypt's photo to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Global Vision Egypt
description:
Global Vision is back with an astonishing scholarship from SP Jain University in Australia.

Global Vision is offering the qualified candidates full scholarships for School of Global Management

The scholarship will cover full tuition fees for 4 years:
- 1 year in the university campus in Singapore
- 1 year in the university campus in Dubai
- 2 year in the university campus in Sydney

After graduation, you get A Two Years work permission in Sydney, Australia.

The Scholarships are available for all Egyptian high school students who have:

- Thanaweya Amma degree with grade > 90%
- I.G. students with 3 A Level Stars 
- I.B degree with grade > 38
- American Diploma with G.P.A > 3.5

The Required documents for registration are
- High School Transcript
-Personal Statement 
- Copy of the Passport 
- IELTS overall score of 6.0 with no component less than 5.5 or TOEFL IBT score of 60 overall, with no component less than 20 ( Applicants who do not have ILET'S or TOEFL certificate they may take an English test exam upon interview)

Deadline to apply: December 1st 2016 
Donâ€™t forget to reserve your seat from 
http://www.globalvisionegypt.com/apply-now/

Office fees will be applied.

For more information regarding the program, please do not hesitate to contact us on:
Tel: +202 3347 4392 | +202 3302 1557 | +2010 0891 4650
or you can visit our Office in: 
41 Lebanon Street, Al-Mohandeseen, Flat No. 04, Giza, Egypt.
Or send an email to: info@globalvisionegypt.com 
www.globalvisionegypt.com
